short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A simple extension to save and restore tabs in browser.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Tab Saver is a simple and efficient Safari extension designed to enhance your browsing experience. Whether you need to temporarily close tabs or want to permanently save important webpages, Tab Saver helps you effortlessly manage and restore your browser tabs.
long.zh_CN: Tab Saver 是一款简洁高效的Safari扩展，无论您是需要临时关闭标签，还是希望长期保存重要的网页，Tab Saver 都能帮助您轻松管理和恢复浏览器中的标签页。
